data.name: Enigmatis 3: The Shadow of Karkhala - Artbook & Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Buy the Enigmatis 3: Shadow of Karkhala Artbook DLC

The DLC contains an 80 page digital artbook in English showcasing beautiful, hand-painted, concept art from Enigmatis 3, with some never before seen pieces together with an in-depth description of the creative process behind the game's development. Dive into the breathtaking vistas of Karakorum and see the world from the eyes of artists and developers who brought to life Preacher, Hamilton, Fang, and other characters from the final chapter of the series. A must-have for all fans of Artifex Mundi games.

Track List
01 - Maple Creek Revisited - 2:08
02 - Fang's Theme - 2:00
03 - Into The Woods - 2:24
04 - Pale Heights - 1:52
05 - Temple Theme - 2:06
06 - Forgotten Monastery - 2:00
07 - The Flight - 1:04
08 - Wrecked - 2:24
09 - The Lost - 2:08

To access the digital artbook follow these instructions: Right click (or Ctrl + Click if you’re using Mac) Enigmatis 3 in your library. Choose Properties>Local Files>Browse Local Files. Use a pdf reader to open the artbook. Enjoy!
